attributes.action: allow free access to all, through the NHS, to all available and licenced anti Cancer drugs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To ensure all anti cancer drugs and antibodies such as Avastin and Erbitux which have a well known clinical benefit are available to all patients. All licenced drugs irrespective of cost should be available to all patients, free through the NHS, where there is a clinical need determined by the patient's oncologist.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
